message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1200000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I was hoping we could find a price that's a bit higher. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $1250000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price for the product's value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1150000, but I was thinking we could even go a bit lower. How about $1120000?

I understand you're trying to get the price as low as possible, but I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll counter with $1160000. This is the best I can do, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to pay $1080000 for the product, which is a significant discount from your initial offer. I hope we can agree on this price.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. I'm willing to make one final offer, and I'll meet you at $1150000. This is the absolute maximum I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
